channel.title: Portforwarding - Should be working
channel.description:
I have tried everything, I am desperate to try and get this to work, I have no idea why it will not work because I have followed many different tutorials and done exactly what I am supposed to do.
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/10zbj94.jpg[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/ivg5fc.jpg[/img]

item.title: Portforwarding - Should be working
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

[quote=“Decronix, post:3, topic:398579”]I might be able to help.

You see, there is this program named Hamachi, it allowed different users to connect to each other.
Firstly, use u torrent and do a port check ( 3rd option in preferences )
Download Hamachi & your first experiance with it will give you all the knowledge you need.

FREE*[/quote]

hamachi = epic fail, if you cant manage to portforward dont bother posting a server

OT: google a program called simple port forwarding, thats what i use for all my portforwards it will do it all for you you just choose your modem model and the ports you wanna forward

Read full topic

Hamachi sucks… If he wanted to use it he would be asking, but hes asking for portforwarding help, not about Hamachi. Go somewhere else.
